summary: This mod provides multiple werewolf balancing options.
descriptionHtml:
[u][size=3]A SKYRIM REBALANCED MOD[/size][/u]

This mod provides three options for rebalancing werewolves in skyrim.

1. Weaker Werewolves: howling makes enemies level 15 or lower flee, instead of 25 and lower.

2. Stronger Werewolves: hand-to-hand (claws) damage bonus increased by ~50%.

3. Combination: included effects of both of the other versions in one plug-in
author: Pocoloon-Bulljump
